ðŸ“– Summary: Kreuzberg is a Python library designed for extracting text from a variety of document formats, including PDFs, images, and office documents. It offers a unified interface and supports multiple OCR engines, providing both asynchronous and synchronous APIs for flexible integration. The library also supports metadata and table extraction.
